title: nivEgaani nanevaru
sahitya:
nIvEgAni nannevaru gAtururA nIrajadaLa nayana



anupallavi



 kavalasina kOri kalicci nannu cAla karuNinca brOcE talli taNDrivi



caraNam 1



 munu mA vashamuna galugu peddalu tapamulanu jEsi yArjincina dhanamu 

vinavayya bahu janmamulanu niNDAru virula vElpulanu pUjincina phalamu

   

caraNam 2



 sharaNAgata jana pApa jvalanamunu shamana jEyu jala pUrita ghanamu 

suramuni jana gaNamula hrdayamu sugrIhamau saccidAnanda ghanamu

   

caraNam 3



 sAgara shayana nadulalO mElaina svarNadi snAnanAniki galgu phalamu 

tyAgarAju varamani brahmAdulaku satyamu jEsi palkina tArakamu
